data.name: Darkness Maze Cube - Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
DISCOVER OTHER GAMES FROM THIS STUDIO:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303660/Geometric_Sniper/


About the Game

Incredible arts specially designed to convey the atmosphere of the game , leaving your computer's desktop looking amazing!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels.

* Important: After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Darkness Maze Cube” is installed by default:
(... \ Steam \ steamapps \ common \ Suicide Maze Cube \ Darkness_Maze_Cube- Wallpapers) or (... \ Steam \ steamapps \ common \ Hardcore Maze Cube \ Darkness_Maze_Cube-Wallpapers)
